# The shmop extension

Configure the `shmop` extension.

This extension provides support for shared memory segments operations.

## PHP_EXT_SHMOP

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_SHMOP_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
